snippet: The Dardennes brothers discuss their film “The Kid With a Bike,” which Belgium bypassed in its submission for foreign-language Oscar but which is up for a Golden Globe.
abstract: The Dardennes brothers discuss their film “The Kid With a Bike,” which Belgium bypassed in its submission for foreign-language Oscar but which is up for a Golden Globe.

headline.main: The Dardennes Have an Idea About the Selection Process
